plot: In a staircase turned funfair, a little girl is playing the "Game of Life". What appears to be lighthearted fun at first soon turns out to be not so harmless after all.
title: Das Spiel des Lebens
plot_es: In a staircase turned funfair, a little girl is playing the "Game of Life". What appears to be lighthearted fun at first soon turns out to be not so harmless after all.
plot_en: In a staircase turned funfair, a little girl is playing the "Game of Life". What appears to be lighthearted fun at first soon turns out to be not so harmless after all.
